Texts.Chs: 阿达科让我等你。我可以帮你打开那个遗物。
Texts.Eng: Adako told me to expect you. I can open that relic for you.

Texts.Chs: 这个工具使用湖仙碎片作为它的动力源，所以你需要找到一片新的。^green;去探索一些古人的遗迹^reset;，然后希望你能在之中找到^orange;天人遗物^reset; - 一个悬浮的小立方体 - 应该包含碎片。拿去给万哈斯 - 一旦你得到遗物，他会知道如何提取碎片。
Texts.Eng: The tool uses a Xanafian Shard as its power source, so you'll need to find a new one. ^green;Find some ruins of the Old Ones^reset;, and hopefully you'll find a ^orange;Centensian Relic^reset; - a small hovering cube - which should contain a Shard. Bring it to Vanhas - he'll know how to extract the Shard once you have the relic.
